title: SEPTIMIAE VENERIAE
NAT NORIC CONIVG
DVL QUAE VIX ANNIS
XXXX T F MARCELLUS
VETER AUGGG
translation: very sweet wife that lived forty years.

structure: Base: 0.37 mt x 0.54 mt x 0.45 mt

people: Two Imperators: Marcus Aurelius (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marcus_Aurelius) and Lucius Verus (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lucius_Verus)
